Longsight CMD: access from Longsight Sou: Planning notes and restrictions

•Trains exiting Longsight CMD at Longsight South Jn must have a dot-stop of zero minutes duration (show‘A’ in activities column)•Trains entering Longsight CMD at Longsight South Jn must be travelling on either the Down Fast or DownStyal approaching Slade Lane Jn.
Longsight Down Goods
Junction Margins
First Movement
Train arriving in Down Goods from Ardwick Jn
column3: Train on Down Slow Line cannot pass SladeLane Jn until the first movement has arrived inthe Down Goods

Longsight CMD: access from Longsight Sou: Longsight North Jn
Planning note

Trains exiting Longsight CMD at Longsight North Jn must have a dot-stop of zero minutes duration (show ‘A’ inactivities column).The Up & Down Goods line is the preferred route between Longsight North Jn and Ardwick Jn for trains to/fromLongsight CMD.
Ardwick Jn
Adjustments to Sectional Running Times
Movement Down
Down trains which have stopped atLevenshulme
column3: Not reaching line speed after departing station

Longsight CMD: access from Longsight Sou: Down trains to Manchester Piccadilly platforms13 and 14 formed of light locomotives, DMU,EMU, 22x, Loco Hauled passenger servicesand NMT
column3: To compensate for shorter distance betweenArdwick Jn and Manchester Piccadilly 13/14platforms compared to that between Ardwick Jnand Manchester Piccadilly Platforms 1 to 12.

Longsight CMD: access from Longsight Sou: Movement Up
All Up locomotive hauled trains except ECStrains for Longsight
column3: Length of train leaving low speed area

Longsight CMD: access from Longsight Sou: All ECS trains for Ardwick T.M.D.
All ECS trains for Longsight CMD via Up Eastor Up Fast
All ECS trains for Longsight CMD via Up Slow

Up trains starting from Manchester PiccadillyPlatforms 13 and 14 to the Up Slow line toSlade lane Jn., formed of light locomotives,DMU, EMU, 22x, Loco Hauled passengerservices and NMTDOES NOT APPLY TO MOVEMENTS TOLONGSIGHT C.S.
column3: To compensate for shorter distance betweenManchester Piccadilly 13/14 platforms andArdwick Jn compared to that betweenManchester Piccadilly Platforms 1 to 12 andArdwick Jn
